text: , colloquially known as ,is a university in Kyoto, Japan. It offers Bachelor’s, Master’s, and Doctoral degrees to around 35,000 students. The university has a central campus in Kyoto, and also has satellite campuses in Kusatsu, Ibaraki, Osaka, and Tokyo. == History == Ritsumeikan University started in 1900. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Colleges and universities in Japan
title: Ritsumeikan University
